name: Knee Circles
steps: Lie down on your back with your legs extended.
Bend your right knee and bring it towards your chest.
Place your hands on your right knee and gently circle your knee in a clockwise direction, making small circles with your knee.
comments: Perform the exercise slowly and gently, without forcing your knee to move beyond its comfortable range of motion.
Use your hands to help guide your knee through the circular motion, if necessary.
